Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 57 runs off 49 balls
Mohammad Rizwan scored 79 runs off 55 balls
Babar Azam scored 68 runs off 52 balls
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets for 31 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
India lost the match by 10 wickets
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan won the match by 10 wickets with 13 balls remaining
India's batting lineup struggled to put up a strong total
Pakistan's opening batsmen, Mohammad Rizwan and Babar Azam, put up a strong partnership
Others: The match was played at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium on October 24, 2021
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2021-22
